venue.name: Location: The American Legion , George W. MacINNES Post #225

item.description:
On Saturday, April 10 at 1:00 P.M.,
Join us at The American Legion on Route 1A in Wrentham, MA.
for an Introductory Presentation about The Independence Caucus.

"A Citizen's Movement"
to take our government back from the "Big Money" Special Interests groups !

Our speaker up from Shelton, CT. ,

is Linda Garamella-Fusco

Who is one of the Region 10 , I-Caucus Representatives
covering The 6 New England States and New York.
The Connecticut State Group is very active Vetting Candidates
for the upcoming elections later this year.
Look forward to an interesting powerpoint Presentation
with time for some questions.


To learn more about The Independence Caucus, please visit their website here:

http://www.icaucus.or...

Take a look at the event posting and three of their videos about," The 12 principles of The Independence Caucus in The Massachusetts Group. The link is here:

http://icaucus.ning.c...

The 3 videos are;

1. Watch Article 1 , "Common non-Sense" Why Our Government has vanished and
what we have to do to get it back

2. Article 3 : "No Taxation Without (Alleged) Representation" How and Why our Taxation System
has been hijacked by "Big Money" Special interests !

3. Article IV "Congress 08 - Bordering On Insanity. How and Why our Justice System
and Rule Of Law have been subverted by Big Money Special Interests. One reason
our Immigration Laws aren't being enforced.

A PDF for their 80 vetting questions can be found here:

80 Vetting questions




For more information, contact:
Jim Eckland
j.eckland@yahoo.com
(978) 365-1727
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the main door . The Meeting room is straight ahead !
item.name: An Introduction To The Independence Caucus for S. New England, Saturday April 10
